pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multilinear Algebra // A set of tools for basic tensor operators. A tensor in the context of data analysis in a multidimensional array. The tools in this package rely on using any discrete transformation (e.g. Fast Fourier Transform (FFT)). Standard tools included are the Eigenvalue decomposition of a tensor, the QR decomposition and LU decomposition. Other functionality includes the inverse of a tensor and the transpose of a symmetric tensor. Functionality in the package is outlined in Kernfeld, E., Kilmer, M., and Aeron, S. (2015) doi:10.1016/j.laa.2015.07.021.
